content:
CommandLineToolSwitch Class

In this Article

Represents a single command line tool switch.

Syntax

Declaration

public class CommandLineToolSwitch

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • CommandLineToolSwitch

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Constructors summary

CommandLineToolSwitch()

Initializes a new instance of the CommandLineToolSwitch.
CommandLineToolSwitch(CommandLineToolSwitchType)

Initializes a new instance of the CommandLineToolSwitch to hold the name, tool, attributes, dependent switches, and values..

Properties summary

AllowMultipleValues

Indicates whether multiple values are allowed.
ArgumentRequired

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether arguments are required in the command line tool switch.
Arguments

Gets or sets the arguments required for the command line tool switch.
BooleanValue

Gets or sets the Boolean value of the command line switch.
Description

Gets or sets the description of the single command line tool switch.
DisplayName

Gets or sets the display name of the switch.
FallbackArgumentParameter

Gets or sets the fallback parameter.
FalseSuffix

Gets or sets the suffix to use when the switch is false or negated.
IncludeInCommandLine

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the command line tool switch in the command line.
IsValid

Gets or sets whether the switch is valid.
Name

Gets or sets the name of the switch.
Number

Gets or sets the value for integer type switches.
Overrides

Gets the overrides for the switch.
Parents

Gets the parents for the switch.
Required

Gets or sets whether the switch is required.
ReverseSwitchValue

Gets or sets the reverse switch text.
Reversible

Gets or sets whether the switch is reversible.
Separator

Gets or sets the separator between the switch and its arguments.
StringList

Gets or sets the collection of strings.
SwitchValue

Gets or sets the value for the switch.
TaskItemArray

Gets or sets an array of task items.
TrueSuffix

Gets or sets the suffix to use when the switch is true.
Type

Gets or sets the type of the switch.
Value

Gets or sets the value of the switch.

Constructors

  • CommandLineToolSwitch()

    Initializes a new instance of the CommandLineToolSwitch.

    public CommandLineToolSwitch ();
  • CommandLineToolSwitch(CommandLineToolSwitchType)

    Initializes a new instance of the CommandLineToolSwitch to hold the name, tool, attributes, dependent switches, and values..

    public CommandLineToolSwitch (Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.CommandLineToolSwitchType toolType);

    Parameters

    • toolType
      CommandLineToolSwitchType

      The type of the switch.

Properties

  • AllowMultipleValues

    Indicates whether multiple values are allowed.

    public bool AllowMultipleValues { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      True if multiple values are allowed; otherwise, false.

  • ArgumentRequired

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether arguments are required in the command line tool switch.

    public bool ArgumentRequired { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      True if arguments are required; otherwise, false.

  • Arguments

    Gets or sets the arguments required for the command line tool switch.

    public System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<Tuple<string,bool>> Arguments { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ICollection<Tuple<String,Boolean>>

      The arguments required for the command line tool switch.

  • BooleanValue

    Gets or sets the Boolean value of the command line switch.

    public bool BooleanValue { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      The Boolean value of the command line switch.

  • Description

    Gets or sets the description of the single command line tool switch.

    public string Description { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The description of the single command line tool switch.

  • DisplayName

    Gets or sets the display name of the switch.

    public string DisplayName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The display name of the switch.

  • FallbackArgumentParameter

    Gets or sets the fallback parameter.

    public string FallbackArgumentParameter { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The fallback parameter.

  • FalseSuffix

    Gets or sets the suffix to use when the switch is false or negated.

    public string FalseSuffix { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The suffix to use when the switch is false or negated.

  • IncludeInCommandLine

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the command line tool switch in the command line.

    public bool IncludeInCommandLine { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if to include the command line tool switch in the command line; otherwise, false.

  • IsValid

    Gets or sets whether the switch is valid.

    public bool IsValid { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      True if the switch is valid; otherwise, false.

  • Name

    Gets or sets the name of the switch.

    public string Name { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the switch.

  • Number

    Gets or sets the value for integer type switches.

    public int Number { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The value for integer type switches.

  • Overrides

    Gets the overrides for the switch.

    public System.Collections.Generic.LinkedList<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<string,string>> Overrides { get; }

    Property Value

    • LinkedList<KeyValuePair<String,String>>

      The overrides for the switch.

  • Parents

    Gets the parents for the switch.

    public System.Collections.Generic.LinkedList<string> Parents { get; }

    Property Value

    • LinkedList<String>

      The parents for the switch.

  • Required

    Gets or sets whether the switch is required.

    public bool Required { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      True If the switch is required; otherwise, false.

  • ReverseSwitchValue

    Gets or sets the reverse switch text.

    public string ReverseSwitchValue { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The reverse switch text.

  • Reversible

    Gets or sets whether the switch is reversible.

    public bool Reversible { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      True if the switch is reversible; otherwise, false.

  • Separator

    Gets or sets the separator between the switch and its arguments.

    public string Separator { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The separator between the switch and its arguments.

  • StringList

    Gets or sets the collection of strings.

    public string[] StringList { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String[]

      The collection of strings.

  • SwitchValue

    Gets or sets the value for the switch.

    public string SwitchValue { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The value for the switch.

  • TaskItemArray

    Gets or sets an array of task items.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] TaskItemArray { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The array of task items.

  • TrueSuffix

    Gets or sets the suffix to use when the switch is true.

    public string TrueSuffix { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The suffix to use when the switch is true.

    Property Value

    • CommandLineToolSwitchType

      The type of the switch.

  • Value

    Gets or sets the value of the switch.

    public string Value { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The value of the switch.
